parameters:
\n!?


\}(Now there are six of them. I can’t take them all on…)
Hmph, not even a Turk can take on six of us at once.

\nHey, rookie! Looks like you’ve gotten yourself into quite a mess on your first day, huh?
Puts mine to shame.
\n<Reno>They just don't know when to give up, huh?

\nThis isn't good.
We still have to take care of the ones already inside the reactor.
Well then, looks like it's your time to shine, rookie. You head inside. I’ll take care of these guys. And don’t worry about it. I’ll catch up with you in no time.
\n<Reno>Well, fellas.  It looks like I can't stick around and babysit.
\n<???>But that's to be expected of the fastest member of the Turks.
\n<Reno>You sure seem to know a lot about me, don't you?
\n<???>Knowing one's enemy is a basic battle strategy.
Unfortunately, that speed of yours is no match for me.
We won't know for sure until we test it now, will we?
Let's test those skills then. Show me the true strength of the Turks!
